items.sentence: Tom wasn't the one who told me how to do that.
Tom was told not to try to do that by himself.
Tom told me that he wouldn't do that tomorrow.
Tom told me he's not going to do that anymore.
Tom told me he already knew he had to do that.
Tom thought I might want to do that by myself.
Tom thought I might not need to do that today.
Tom thought I might not have to do that today.
Tom thought I might not be allowed to do that.
Tom thought I might need to do that by myself.
